Summary: Nightly ongoing recurrences of events. I have been taking photos since January 2009.
Object Shape: Fireball, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Square, Rectagular, Star-like
divs: sighting detailsi have compiled a few videos of still shots taken from my front yard. the ones submitted are very recent, although i have been taking pictures of them since january 2009. they are in the sky every night without fail and one doesn't have to wait and see if they appear. the reason i have still shots and not video clips is that my camera presents them more clearly in the picture mode. all were taken with an olympus c-2100 ultra zoom. 2.1 mega pixel w\10x optical zoom. not very up to date equipment for sure. i could write a book on just what these "things" can do. they can change shapes and sizes, move at lightening speeds or hover. make noises like aircraft and the list goes on. i would like more info on just who or what may contact me before i can agree to release my info to a third part. mufon may use any and all of the videos i presented as it deems it needs to. mufon may copy and distribute as its deems it needs to. it is important to note that they are there nightly. thanks for your time concerning this matter.
